data.actual_result: The full number displays, overflowing under the "#" symbol in the channel name.
data.expected_result: There should be ellipses after the first digit, like before.
data.short_description: The notification icon overflows in the button on the top left that opens the channel list.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get >9999 mentions. - Notice the mention count in the channel list button overflow.
